input.sentences: i work security at the fall festival .
it 's not a hard job . mostly i just make sure people are n't stealing things .
i check out the facepainting booth to make sure the workers are behaving .
i help a few little kids that get separated from their parents .
and at the end of the day | i keep an eye on the hot air balloons .
output.sentences: The fall festival has security people.
Their job is to keep people from stealing.
They also check the facepaint workers.
They help when parents and their kids become separated.
That day they also guarded the hot air balloons.
